content.raw: :tada: Awesome!
content.html: Awesome!

We need to remove these hardcoded paths. In fact, they cause the simulation to crash for me. This fixes the crash:

diff -r d9d17b04d669 src/rendering/SceneManager.cc
--- a/src/rendering/SceneManager.cc     Thu Aug 08 17:23:49 2019 +0800
+++ b/src/rendering/SceneManager.cc     Mon Aug 12 11:39:16 2019 -0700
@@ -477,7 +477,21 @@
   descriptor.meshName = _actor.SkinFilename();
   common::MeshManager *meshManager = common::MeshManager::Instance();
   descriptor.mesh = meshManager->Load(descriptor.meshName);
+  if (nullptr == descriptor.mesh)
+  {
+    ignerr << "Actor skin mesh [" << _actor.SkinFilename() << "] not found."
+           << std::endl;
+    return rendering::VisualPtr();
+  }
+
   common::SkeletonPtr meshSkel = descriptor.mesh->MeshSkeleton();
+  if (nullptr == meshSkel)
+  {
+    ignerr << "Actor skin mesh [" << _actor.SkinFilename() << "] not found."
+           << std::endl;
+    return rendering::VisualPtr();
+  }
+
   rendering::MeshPtr actorMesh = this->dataPtr->scene->CreateMesh(descriptor);
   if (nullptr == actorMesh)
   {

To remove the hardcoded path, we'll need this PR on Ignition Fuel. With that PR, I can load this actor like this:

    <include>
      <pose>0 0 1.3 0 0 0</pose>
      <uri>https://fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/1.0/chapulina/models/Walking actor</uri>
    </include>

Unfortunately, we don't support Fuel URLs directly on <filename> yet. So I think the best way for you to test custom models would be to create an account on Fuel and upload different models as you need them. Feel free to upload the DAE files from Gazebo classic and the BVH files from the CMU database.

content.raw: The fix on `ign-fuel-tools` has been merged and released in version 3.2.1
content.html: The fix on ign-fuel-tools has been merged and released in version 3.2.1

content.html: Thanks. I added your codes to fix the bug. I have also moved the sdf to fuel app store.
